body: <u></u>want to know that can moderators unban people? Or only senior moderators and admins can?
body_tagged: <u></u>want to know that can moderators unban people? Or only senior moderators and admins can?
title: A question

replies.body: Moderators can comment on an appeal that concerns them, such as providing evidence or opinions, however only Senior Mods and Admins can fully deny/appeal an appeal.
replies.body_tagged: Moderators can comment on an appeal that concerns them, such as providing evidence or opinions, however only Senior Mods and Admins can fully deny/appeal an appeal.
